txt.en:
'Have you seen the Orcs around these parts, friend [placeholder]? Disgusting, aren't they?

'I doubt such horrors would have peopled Durin's worst nightmares. In his name, rid us of some of this infestation!

'You will find many of these infested Orcs to the south, around the encampment they call Dalgum-ru.'
'This situation is revolting! It is a good thing you've gotten rid of some of those Orcs, [placeholder], but our work is far from done!'
'They are everywhere! If you are having trouble finding some -- and I'm not sure how you could be -- you can look south, around Dalgum-ru.'
Tyki wants you to kill some of the fungus-infested Orcs he has seen in the area.
Globsnaga Orcs can be found at Dalgum-ru, south of the Shadowed Refuge.\n\nTyki wants you to slay the Globsnaga Orcs in the area.
Speak to Tyki at the Shadowed Refuge
Tyki is at the Shadowed Refuge, north of Dalgum-ru.\n\nYou should return to Tyki and report that Dalgum-ru is indeed heavily infested with Orcs, and you have slain many.
